pages.text: But they (disbelieved and) called him a liar. Therefore, they will certainly be present there (on the Day of Judgment to face the punishment)
Except the sincere servants of Allah
And among the generations to follow, We let his name be honored and revered
Peace be upon Ilyas
This is really how We reward the righteous ones
Indeed, he was one of Our (obedient and) believing servants
´Loot´ was also one of the messengers
We rescued him and all the members of his family
Except an old woman destined to stay behind
Then We destroyed the others _ all the rest of them
In fact, you do pass by their ruins during the day
And during the night! Don´t you have any sense
And surely, Yunus was also one of the messengers
He (abandoned his post and) fled aboard a crowded ship
(To save the ship) he agreed to take part in the casting of the lots _ and lost. (Hence, he was thrown overboard)
A whale swallowed him. He was (at fault and) blame worthy
He was one of those who (extol and) glorify Allah routinely
Else, he would have stayed in the belly of the fish till the day of resurrection
But We tossed him ashore in a barren area without any shade. He was stricken with illness and emaciated
We grew a plant _ a creeper _ over and around (to shade and protect) him
(Later), We sent him back to the community of a hundred thousand plus
They believed, so We had them enjoy life for a while
Ask their opinion. (Is it fair that) your Lord should have daughters while they prefer sons for themselves
Or did We create the angels as female beings? Were they present there, watching
Beware! What they utter is certainly self-conceived, and merely fiction
(Do they say) Allah has borne a child? Of course they are lying
Does He (really) prefer daughters over sons
